org.apache.flex.compiler.clients

Class ASC

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.compiler.clients.ASC

  • public class ASC
extends Object
    ActionScript Compiler command-line interface.

    Although ASC can parse most of the command-line options supported by the old ASC, only a few of them are implemented at the moment.

    See Also:
    ASC client spec

      • mainNoExit

        public int mainNoExit(String[] args)
        Do not call System.exit(int) here to allow unit testing. Uses System.out and System.err as default streams
        Parameters:
        args - arguments
        Returns:
        exit code

        err - stderr printstream
        Returns:

        Parameters:

      • getOutputDirectory

        public String getOutputDirectory()
        Get the user specified output directory. Set using the "-outdir" option.
        Returns:
        user specified directory. May be null if no directory was specified.

      • setOutputDirectory

        public void setOutputDirectory(String outputDirectory)
        Set the output directory from the "-outdir" option.
        Parameters:
        outputDirectory - A path string.

      • getOutputBasename

        public String getOutputBasename()
        Get the user specified basename. This option only makes sense when merging ABCs. The basename can be specified using the "-out" option.
        Returns:
        the basename of output files. May be null if no basename was specified.

      • setOutputBasename

        public void setOutputBasename(String outputBasename)
        Set the basename. Typically set to the value of the "-out" option.
        Parameters:
        outputBasename - The base name of the output file.

      • getParallel

        public boolean getParallel()
        Gets a boolean that indicates whether or not parallel code generation of method bodies is enabled.
        Returns:
        true if method bodies should be generated in parallel, false otherwise.

      • setParallel

        public void setParallel(boolean parallel)
        Enables or disables parallel code generation of method bodies.
        Parameters:
        parallel - If true, method bodies will be generated in parallel.

      • isInliningEnabled

        public boolean isInliningEnabled()
        Gets a boolean that indicates whether or not inlining of method bodies is enabled.
        Returns:
        true if inlining enabled, false otherwise.

      • setEnableInlining

        public void setEnableInlining(boolean enableInlining)
        Enables or disables parallel code generation of method bodies.
        Parameters:
        enableInlining - If true, method bodies will be generated in parallel.

      • setRemoveDeadCode

        public void setRemoveDeadCode(boolean removeDeadCode)
        Enable or disable dead code removal.
        Parameters:
        removeDeadCode - true if dead code is to be removed.

      • getRemoveDeadCode

        public boolean getRemoveDeadCode()
        Returns:
        true if dead code is to be removed.
